full_summary:
========================

# VWware License-Support Renewal

## Identification

* Title: VWware License-Support Renewal
* Reference Number: cb-540-47374655
* Solicitation Number: EV7965
* Publication Date: November 19, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: December 3, 2024, 17:00:00

## Contract Details

* Duration: December 9, 2024 to December 8, 2027
* Contracting Entity: Government of the Northwest Territories
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ 5009 49th Street, Yellowknife, Northwest Territories X1A 2L9, Canada

## Technical Specifications

* The Government of the Northwest Territories, Procurement Shared Services, on behalf of the Department of Finance, is requesting tenders for the supply of VWware License-Support Renewal.
* Vendor shall provide software and system management software services.

## Geographical and Trade Requirements

* Regions of Opportunity: Northwest Territories
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Trade Agreements: Please refer to the Tender Description or Tender Documents

## Contact Information

* Contract Administration
	+ Email: [PSSTenders@gov.nt.ca](mailto:PSSTenders@gov.nt.ca)
	+ Phone: (867) 767-9044
	+ Fax: (867) 920-4112

Note: Some details were extracted from the original output to provide clarity and enhanced readability. Please refer to the original output for additional information.
